text: The 1900 New York Giants season was the franchise's 18th season. The team finished in eighth place, last, in the National League with a 60–78 record, 23 games behind the Brooklyn Superbas. == Regular season == The 1900 New York Giants === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
